facts: The strange, moving star-like object that descends and bursts into sparks over white-robed figures is a recurring phenomenon that Godfrey first noticed about ten days before the narrator's arrival.

This fact connects the observations across multiple chapters and establishes the recurring nature of the phenomenon.
